attributes.title: terrible.
attributes.review: the app hacks into your emails, phone calls, and other personal info. it also adds bots onto your phone which causes apps to crash and even delete themselves, and once you download the app it wont allow you to delete it until about a month of having it and in that month it wont let you download any other apps and it wont even allow access to netflix on your phone. this app is trash and i do not recommend getting it if you want your phone to not be bugged.

attributes.title: Very Hurtful
attributes.review: When I was downloading it, it said that I was Mexican and I was not allowed to use it. That not okay guys. Please get rid of it

attributes.title: WORST APP TO EXIST 💞✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! 😡😡 i downloaded the trump 2020 app and as soon as i did trump came out of my phone. he called me ugly but he offered to give me a makeover. (he’s so kind) when i opened my eyes i was shocked to find out that i was now ORANGE!!!! he said that i had to look like him so that everyone would know that i’m racist and homophobic i mean so that everyone would know that i’m a trump supporter. when i took the makeup off my skin was WHITE!!!! i went to the white house to ask him what happened and he said that i looked much better this way and that i was hideous before (i was black before) my parents disowned me and now i have no where to live all thanks to this stupid app. 0/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: OMG 😱
attributes.review: This app is soooo horrible. It gave me alopecia. This app tells people where you are at all times and it uses your data to place false votes for trump. This app also show pictures of trump naked 🤢 never in my life would i think i would go blind. DONT GET THIS APP‼️‼️‼️

attributes.title: Horrible and disgusting
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my phone died. When I charged it back up my screen was stuck on an add to join a service where we tried to put a racist, bigoted, misogynistic man in charge of the country. It was promoting minors drinking and having kids play with guns. Don’t recommend!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP NEVER GET THISSSS!!
attributes.review: this app caused a horrible virus on my phone and alsoooo supports a rapist and yes you saw correctly as well a a racists even tho he is supposed to be running our country but instead he mad this horrible app🤮 pls i advise you to not get this AT ALLLLLL!!!!!

attributes.title: Not Reliable, Just Like Fox News
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app my phone started glitching and lagging. I shut my phone down and restarted it but it didn’t change anything.
